welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Appley Bridge, a charming and picturesque village in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely town has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Warton Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
